value: Trailer parking for 50 trailers, separate inbound/outbound lanes
Average 2-hour dwell time for inbound, 1-hour for outbound
12 inbound doors, 18 outbound doors across all facilities
Scheduled appointments for 80% of deliveries, first-come-first-served for remaining
85% on-time arrival rate, some delays during peak periods
15% of volume cross-docked, primarily fast-moving consumer goods
Dedicated cross-dock area, direct transfer from receiving to shipping
Same-day or next-day turnaround for cross-dock items
Wave picking for multi-line orders, 3-4 waves per shift
Manual wave planning based on order cut-off times and carrier schedules
4-6 hours from wave release to ship
FIFO for most products, client-specific rules for some
System-directed based on location and product attributes
Lot/batch tracking for regulated products, expiry date management
